    • 方法详细资料

      • addPermission

        protected void addPermission(DocumentDao documentDao,
                             AbstractElement element,
                             java.lang.String recipient,
                             int level)
        从类复制的说明: DataSourcePopulator
        Allows subclass to add permissions.
        覆盖:
        addPermission 在类中 DataSourcePopulator
        参数:
        documentDao - that will presumably offer methods to enable the operation to be completed
        element - to the subject of the new permissions
        recipient - to receive permission (if it starts with ROLE_ it is assumed to be a GrantedAuthority, else it is a username)
        level - based on the static final integer fields on this class
